title: Learning Design Competency Enhancement: Evaluation of Instructional Design Principles and Methods—Project-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and science subject matter expertise
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The difference between instructional design principles (first principle) and situational teaching methods can be clearly distinguished and explained
Appropriate teaching methods for science education scenarios can be selected, with at least three justifications provided
Science education projects can be planned, implemented, and evaluated by applying instructional design methods in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
